column4: anyone know a easy program to change wma into mp3 ?  kicking myself for using windows media player to rip my cd's......kicking myself for using MS to try do anything right!
windows does rip cd's in mp3 format btw. just have to change the setting in media player.
the files arent sabatoged, its just that wm format is proprietary. mp3 didnt use to be an open format either once upon a time
